title: HELP ME MY FPS ON THIS PATCH IS LOW
body:
my laptop is asus x554l with nvidia 920 2gb  intel core-i3 4005u 1.7 GHz

i playing with 70 fps in new patch my fps is so low now is 15fps i cant play anyone can help me

replies.body: If it's been happening since the recent patch then you could have bad game files since your update, or just outdated drivers causing frame drops.  Go through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your pc and get things running smoothly!  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have been having the same issues for a few days and have tried everything on that FPS Issues guide. Nothing has worked and I even tried it on two different machines. It has non stop been happening to me since patch 7.6. Please help!

If the guide didn't help and you're still having fps issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can assist individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to help us get more context, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you!
If nothing else is working you can just uninstall and then redownload league. It should fix your problem for sure.
